scripts.test: node tasks/test/unsupported-features.js && npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.build: node tasks/build.js && npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.build:quick: node tasks/build.js && npm run test:node && npm run code:lint
scripts.lint: npm run code:lint && npm run docs:lint
scripts.package: cross-env MINIFY=1 node tasks/build.js && cross-env MINIFY=1 npm run test
scripts.docs: npm run docs:lint && npm run docs:build
scripts.travis: npm run lint && npm run package && npm run docs && npm run examples && npm run test:graalvm
